info.title: IRIS2 Public Authenticated API
info.description: IRIS2 is a complete tool for managing communications between citizens and institutions. It's the main citizen support software for the Ajuntament de Barcelona.This is the public (accesible outside the corporate network) part of its API.

post.description: Endpoint to get back a record card sent to External processing that the external service has cancelled

404.description: RecordCard is not available to external cancelling
